title: How Long Does It Normally Take To Get Verified For A PBE Account?
body: It's been months, maybe even a year since I signed up for a PBE account but I haven't been accepted. Am I just out of luck?

replies.body: I signed up. COmpletely gave up on getting in and forgot all about it and then got an email at least over a year later saying I've been accepted.

There's no set time on how long it takes to get into the PBE. Sometimes it can be a few weeks, for others it can be months, and yet others may have a hard time getting in at all. We typically look for players who are a positive influence on the community and would provide great feedback.

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for full details on how the PBE works. Let me know if you have any questions.
